home.title: Your projects
home.subtitle: Jump back into your workspace
home.noProjectsMessage: Create your first project to get started

language.title: Language
language.subtitle: Choose how the app speaks to you
language.preferredLanguageDescription: Select one language for the app interface
language.changesNote: Changes take effect immediately in all screens

profile.title: Settings
profile.subtitle: Manage your account and preferences
profile.connectedAccountsDescription: Use social accounts to sign in
profile.appPreferencesDescription: Customize how the app looks and behaves
profile.darkModeDescription: Reduce brightness and use dark theme
profile.languageSettingDescription: Change the language of the app
profile.logOutMessage: You can sign back in at any time with your email or connected accounts

network.timeout: Connection timed out. Please try again.
network.connection_failed: Unable to connect. Check your internet connection.
network.offline: You're offline. Changes will sync when you reconnect.

http.429: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
http.503: Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again shortly.
http.500: Server error occurred. Our team has been notified.
http.404: Resource not found. It may have been removed.
http.400: Invalid request. Please check your input.

blender_api.invalid_file: File format not supported. Please use USDZ or GLB files.
blender_api.malformed_usdz: File appears corrupted. Try exporting it again.
blender_api.file_too_large: File exceeds 250 MB limit. Please reduce file size.
blender_api.invalid_session: Session not found. Please start a new conversion.
blender_api.session_expired: Session expired after 1 hour. Please upload again.

fallback.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
fallback.retry_exceeded: Maximum retry attempts reached. Please try again later.
